name: Pallister-Hall syndrome
aliases: A syndrome that is characterized by hypothalamic hamartoma, pituitary dysfunction, central polydactyly, and visceral malformations and has_material_basis_in autosomal dominant heterozygous mutation in the GLI3 gene on chromosome 7p14.
Hypothalamic Hamartoblastoma, Hypopituitarism, Imperforate Anus, and Postaxial Polydactyly

Subclass of.name: multiple congenital anomalies/dysmorphic syndrome-variable intellectual disability syndrome
syndrome with limb duplication, polydactyly, syndactyly, and/or hyperphalangy
syndromic renal or urinary tract malformation
disease associated with non-acquired combined pituitary hormone deficiency
